meanings.definition: The act or process of thinking.
meanings.sent1: Her thought about the story was deep.
meanings.sent2: I lost my thought in the middle of the conversation.
meanings.sent3: His thought on wearing socks with sandals made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The thought of flying without wings seemed impossible.
meanings.sent5: The thought of ice cream on a hot day is refreshing.

meanings.definition: An idea or opinion produced by thinking.
meanings.sent1: The thought of going to the beach excited her.
meanings.sent2: I had a thought about how to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: His thought on cats wearing hats was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The thought of love as a flame burning bright is beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The thought of a rainbow after the rain is hopeful.

meanings.sent1: Her thought on the matter was insightful.
meanings.sent2: The thought of a new invention sparked his creativity.
meanings.sent3: His thought on dancing penguins made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The thought of time as a river flowing endlessly is intriguing.
meanings.sent5: The thought of a butterfly emerging from a cocoon is magical.
